entry.title: New release for BigBlueButton: v3.0.1
entry.content:
In this iteration we have included various fixes to the client. Accessibility was improved (Thanks @schrd and Martin). The exporting with annotations also was patched. Several patches made it possible again to join sessions with older Safari browser versions.

Below is a list of the pull requests in this iteration, grouped by component.

Link to installation command / instructions/ schedule / planned features : https://docs.bigbluebutton.org/3.0/new-features

Big THANK YOU to all community members who helped for this release - both through sending pull requests and through reporting bugs or requesting enhancements! :confetti_ball:

HTML5 client

fixes * fix(chat) Improve accessibility by @schrd in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22151 * Fix missing top padding for NotificationBar by @SamuelWei in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22462 * fix(guest-waiting): update guest as loggedOut in database by @germanocaumo in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22436 * fix(whiteboard): Add NaN check for zoom calculation by @JoVictorNunes in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22445 * fix: External Video is played in CAMERAS_ONLY Layout by @ramonlsouza in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22439 * fix: Changing slide while a poll is open closes the poll by @ramonlsouza in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22425 * fix: Show users who have not responded to the poll results by @ramonlsouza in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22464 * fix: Presentation overlapping Webcams with userdata-bbb_hide_nav_bar by @ramonlsouza in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22433 * Fix(html5): Non subscription error triggering 3006 error by @Tainan404 in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22472 * Refactor(html5): Make screenshare audio be muted when quick swap is enabled and when non media layout is selected by @Tainan404 in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22397 * fix: Client crash when exporting a presentation (not every time) by @ramonlsouza in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22467 * fix(whiteboard): Refetch shapes after toggling fit-to-width by @JoVictorNunes in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22459 * Fix(html5): User leave notification burst by @Tainan404 in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22476 * Accessibility improvements by @schrd in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22481 * Fix(html5): Make modal z-index be under notification z-index by @Tainan404 in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22474 * fix: Add checks to avoid undefined and crashes by @antobinary in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22484 * fix: Webcams are played in PRESENTATION_ONLY Layout by @ramonlsouza in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22443 * fix (html5): Change textToMarkdown func removing regex lookbehind by @gustavotrott in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22487 * Fix(html5): Add more details for error log on rtt fail by @Tainan404 in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22475 * fix (html5): Tweak textToMarkdown to handle images properly by @gustavotrott in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22489 * fix: only use AbortSignal.timeout if available by @ramonlsouza in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22492

locales * Updates for project BigBlueButton v3.0 HTML5 client and language et by @transifex-integration in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22441 * Updates for project BigBlueButton v3.0 HTML5 client and language ja by @transifex-integration in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22438

bbb-export-annotations

  • fix(bbb-export-annotations): fix image export being blank by @GuiLeme in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22477

Core

  • fix (akka-apps): Prevents line breaks in logs by @gustavotrott in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22486

docs

  • docs: preparation for BBB 3.0.0 by @antobinary in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22444
  • docs: Adjust yq commands to yq version 4.16.2 by @antobinary in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22453
  • docs: update the portion about reducing webcam bandwidth by @antobinary in https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/pull/22454

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bigbluebutton/compare/v3.0.0...v3.0.1

Release name

Passing -v jammy-300 to https://github.com/bigbluebutton/bbb-install/blob/v3.0.x-release/bbb-install.sh will always install the latest released BigBlueButton 3.0 version.

If for some reason you would like to install this specific release, pass -v jammy-300-3.0.1.

We still recommend using -v jammy-300 as this repository is continually updated with each BigBlueButton 3.0 release.
